Posts.EditableText:
Hi guys, i looked the thread like crazy but I couldn't find it.

There was a way to use an image as a command by clicking on it.  Do you remember the code for that? 

Something like this in the editor of the room description: {command:help:"image url"}

Thank you,
Posts.HTML:
Hi guys, i looked the thread like crazy but I couldn't find it.

There was a way to use an image as a command by clicking on it. Do you remember the code for that?

Something like this in the editor of the room description: {command:help:"image url"}

Thank you,

Posts.EditableText:
I think you want to do this:
```
{command:help:{img:test.png}}
```
Posts.HTML:
I think you want to do this:

{command:help:{img:test.png}}
